entity.name: Mauro
entity.description: Im the developer of Zen Browser, a web browser that is fast, secure, and easy to use. I am passionate about creating software that makes people's lives easier and more enjoyable.

projects.name: Zen
projects.description: Zen is a beautiful, fast, and productive web browser. It is designed to be packed with features that make it easy to use and navigate. Zen is built on the latest Firefox engine, providing speed, privacy, and security.

channels.name: Patreon
channels.description: Patreon is a membership platform that makes it easy for artists and creators to get paid.

channels.name: Ko-fi
channels.description: Ko-fi is a platform that allows creators to receive donations from their fans.

plans.name: Licenses and hosting
plans.description: Help me pay for the licenses and hosting of the project. This includes self-hosting build servers, cloudflare services, and software licenses.

plans.name: Goodwill plan
plans.description: Pay anything you wish to show your goodwill for the project.
